info.title: Legal Context - Read
info.description: Legal contexts are templates for legal transactions that predefines how a legal transaction must be processed; what information must be provided; which parties are involved and so on. The service contains legal context and legal context text nodes. The information sent in the request pay load is used while working with a legal context, including appropriate checks for restricted values and authorizations. Once the legal context is available, the legal context ID is sent in the response. If there are any issues in this process, the system displays error messages in the response. For more information, refer to the business documentation of this API.

x-sap-shortText: Read legal contexts using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: [SAP S/4HANA for Enterprise Contract Management(1XV)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1XV " Link To BP ")

x-sap-extensible.description:
API can be extended by custom fields on the following business contexts (field usage for this API needs to be selected):
* Enterprise Contract Management: Legal Context (LCM_CONTEXT)
* Enterprise Contract Management: Linked Objects in Legal Context (LCM_CTX_LINKOBJ)

[How to add an extension field to an API](https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0f69f8fb28ac4bf48d2b57b9637e81fa/ce819b8557194ae0aa180ba4ac6a04de.html)
